About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

By day, I am a UI/UX Designer at Makarios Pvt. Ltd. By night/weekend I am a freelance Front End Developer and Graphics Designer who loves helping companies create great website. With 2+ years of developing and designing experience, I specialize in Photoshop, Illustrator, Xd and Figma and HTML, CSS/SaaS, Javascript, React. My projects are clean, concise and always on time.

Front End Developer

By the use of HTML, CSS/SaaS, Javascript I create static website, portfolio websites and ecommerce website. Using React I like to create mobile applications. Check out some of projects in the project section.

Graphics Designer

Design is always changing. I like to keep up with the latest trend of design. Special skills in logo design, illustrations, banner design and all kinds of printing design. All projects are on time and meets the clients' demands.
